summary: Email correspondence between a forensic accountant at the FBI and an Assistant United States Attorney regarding the preparation and service of a subpoena to CapitalOne bank for financial records. The document shows coordination in the investigation of financial aspects of the Epstein case.

persons.name: Maurene
persons.context: Addressed in an email forwarding a subpoena rider; appears to be involved in the legal process of preparing the subpoena.

persons.name: Forensic Accountant
persons.role: Forensic Accountant at FBI New York Field Office
persons.context: Requests preparation of a subpoena for CapitalOne, provides account details and instructions for where to send results.

persons.name: Special Agent
persons.role: Special Agent at Federal Bureau of Investigation
persons.context: Listed as the recipient for the subpoena results at the FBI's New York field office.

persons.name: Assistant United States Attorney
persons.role: Prosecutor in Southern District of New York
persons.context: Sends the finalized subpoena attachment and provides contact information from the U.S. Attorney's Office.

connections.description: Coordinating on the preparation and service of a subpoena for financial records in an investigation.
Both are FBI personnel; the forensic accountant directs subpoena results to the special agent.
The AUSA forwards a subpoena rider to Maurene, indicating a working relationship in legal document preparation.

events.title: Subpoena Preparation for CapitalOne
events.description: Email correspondence regarding the preparation and service of a subpoena to CapitalOne bank for financial records as part of an investigation.

locations: Southern District of New York, 1 St. Andrew's Plaza, New York, NY 10007
Federal Bureau of Investigation, 26 Federal Plaza, New York, NY 10278
FBI New York Field Office, 26 Federal Plaza, NYC, NY 10278
keyFacts: A subpoena was being prepared for CapitalOne bank to obtain financial records relevant to an investigation.
The forensic accountant at the FBI provided specific account details and instructions for the subpoena.
Results from the subpoena were to be sent electronically to a Special Agent at the FBI's New York field office.
The communication shows coordination between the FBI and the U.S. Attorney's Office in the Southern District of New York.
